translations: v.起诉，控告，检举；（律师在法庭上）指控，公诉；<正式>继续（尤指战争）；<古>继续从事（某职业），追求

phrs.translation: 告发, 进行, 依法处置
告发, 继续从事, 处罚
依法查处, 立案查处, 查办, 翻译

sentences.sentence: The police have decided not to prosecute because the evidence is not strong enough.
sentences.translation: 警方已决定不起诉，因为证据不够充分。

sentences.sentence: He has decided to prosecute her after careful consideration of all the relevant facts.
sentences.translation: 他仔细考虑了所有相关事实后，决定起诉她。

sentences.sentence: The Attorney General was aware of the political implications of his decision to prosecute.
sentences.translation: 总检察长知道自己起诉的决定可能引起的政治后果。
